description: Improve your cold-weather running endurance this winter with the lightweight yet hardworking RUN EASY Half-Zip Long-Sleeve mid layer top by ODLO. The highly-technical fabric of this versatile mid layer delivers exceptional insulation and moisture management, enhanced by the half-zip turtleneck, which traps in warmth or allows for additional ventilation when you need it – keeping your personal climate set to optimum at all times. Meanwhile, the reflective detailing helps you stay visible in low light and the lightweight fabric offers a full range of movement, leaving you free to push your body to its limit. Defend yourself against the elements and keep your performance on the right track – grab ODLO’s RUN EASY Half-Zip Long-Sleeve mid layer top for men.
name: Odlo Run Easy Warm 1/2 Zip - Mens
